 boolean isFull()
           
 int NextIdx()
           
 T put(T t, EventHistory.EvAction action)
          Add an event to the event history Eliminate java garbage cration by reusing the same object T Supplied object t is used to populate the event history array and the current object at that array location is returned to the calling process so that the calling process can use that object for the next event of the same type

public T put(T t,
             EventHistory.EvAction action)
Add an event to the event history Eliminate java garbage cration by reusing the same object T Supplied object t is used to populate the event history array and the current object at that array location is returned to the calling process so that the calling process can use that object for the next event of the same type

public void clear()
Clear the event history, needs to be done under lock
